snippet.title: Chronic stress, inflammation and hormone balance | Season 1 Ep. 39
snippet.description:
Interview with Dr. Amber Krogsrud. Dr. Amber Krogsrud is a Naturopathic Doctor who focuses in Holistic Hormone Health. Prior to her undergraduate studies, she worked in an chiropractic clinic and discovered the beauty of natural medicine. She also developed a passion for nutrition and began pursuing a career that viewed health as a holistic lifestyle involving food as nutrition. To convert this passion to a career, Dr. Amber completed a four year medical degree at the prestigious Bastyr University in San Diego, California.

In this podcast episode you will learn:
- What a naturopathic doctor focuses on
- What indicators in your body show stress levels
- The negative effects of stress on your health
- The three phases of stress
- The antagonists cortisol and melatonin
- How physical health impacts mental health and vice versa

Enjoy listening.

With gratitude,
Julia

---
Shownotes:

Book recommendations:
Deep Nutrition, Catherine Shanahan
The Millionaire Fastlane, MJ DeMarco

How to connect with Amber:

Website: https://www.drambernd.com 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/doctorambernd/

8-Week Online Coaching Program “From Stressed to Empowered”:
